headline: Is Nordson Corporation (NDSN) the Best Dividend Growth Stock to Buy and Hold in 2025?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold in 2025. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Nordson Corporation (NASDAQ:NDSN) stands against the other dividend growth stocks. Dividend stocks had a challenging year in 2024 as investor interest largely shifted toward technology stocks. […]

headline: Three Reasons to Avoid NDSN and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Nordson’s shares (currently trading at $211.27) have posted a disappointing 7.2% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 8.8% gain. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.

headline: Highest Quality Dividend Kings For 2025
summary: Only 11 Dividend Kings outperformed the S&P 500 during the last decade based on Total Return. Check out five Dividend Kings earn the rank of High Quality.
